SubRoundDesc: Login everyday to claim the sign-in reward.\nThe rewards are refreshed after you have signed in for 28 days.

- Rules: Log in for 7 days in a row to get 2500 Black Cards in total (including purchase rewards).

- How to Claim: Rewards of the day of your purchase will be granted immediately after purchase. From the second day onwards, rewards can be claimed by signing in on the main interface.

 -View Status: After you claim them, you can find the tab of the pack in the [Main Interface - Event] system and view the claim status.

- Rules: Log in for 3 days in a row to get 1250 Event Construct R&D Tickets in total.

- How to Claim: You will get the first day's reward right after purchase. Future rewards can be claimed automatically by logging in after 05:00 UTC each day. You can also claim them manually in [Main Interface - Event]. Unclaimed rewards will not be reissued later...

- View Status: After claiming, you can find this pack's tab in [Main Interface - Event] and check its status.

Commandant, Celica has prepared 7-day Sign-in Rewards for you!
Sign in for 4 days total to get a [6★ Weapon Choice Pack]!
Don't forget to sign in, Commandant!
—Celica

Detailed rewards:
Day 1: Basic Construct R&D Ticket x250, Inver-Shard - Lotus x10
Day 2: Basic Construct R&D Ticket x500
Day 3: Basic Construct R&D Ticket x250, Cog Pack (XXL) x2
Day 4: 6★ Weapon Choice Pack, Inver-Shard - Eclipse x20
Day 5: Basic Construct R&D Ticket x250, Cog Pack (XXL) x2
Day 6: Basic Construct R&D Ticket x250, Inver-Shard - Storm x20
Day 7: Basic Construct R&D Ticket x500

Let's celebrate the 100-DAY ANNIVERSARY of the Punishing: Gray Raven official launch! And also, HAPPY HALLOWEEN! \nLogin everyday during the event period to claim generous rewards and exclusive 5★ Memory [Lucia: Summer Daze]!

We've walked through half a year together, Commandant. How time flies! Thank you for accompanying Punishing: Gray Raven! \nTo show our gratitude, we provide a special 5-days sign-in reward. Login everyday then you can claim the following rewards: Target Weapon R&D Ticket, Event Construct R&D Ticket, new Dorm Furniture, and so on.
Lantern Festival, a special day in Eastern culture. Hope the thoughts of the young girl can be turned into courage and motivation on the battlefield.
Happy White Day, Commandants!\nLog in every day during the event period to claim sign-in rewards, including rare item: White Affection, Basic Construct R&D Tickets, etc.

Participate in the [Kowloong Bygone] additional sign-in event to claim rewards every day! \nLog in for 5 days totally during the event to join the lucky draw. Rewards like PlayStation 5, Lucia: Dawn figures, collaboration gaming mouse and mouse pad are waiting for you!
